sourcesContent:
import { Component, HostListener } from '@angular/core' @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { headerVisible = true @HostListener('window:scroll', []) onWindowScroll (): void { const scrollTop = window.scrollY const offset = window.innerHeight / 2 const range = 200 const calc = 1 - (scrollTop - offset + range) / range this.headerVisible = calc > 0 && calc <= 1 } }
